about-me: I'm a 19 years old software developer, specialized in creating web applications with React and SpringBoot. Skilled in Java, Typescript/Javascript and SQL, with expertise in UI/UX, RESTful APIs and Docker.

tere-verde.description: Terê Verde is a website we developed from the ground up to highlight the natural attractions and ecotourism opportunities in Teresópolis. Unlike the city’s official platform - which suffers from poor design, slow navigation, and a lack of accessibility — our solution offers a clean, responsive interface with intuitive filters and fast performance, making it easy for any visitor to explore the region’s biodiversity with just a few clicks.
